title: Ukrainian robotics company says autonomy in defense is overhyped — but it's also past the point of no return
description: Defense forces "want a hundred percent reliability and the AI is just not there," Ark Robotics' founder and CEO told Business Insider.
content:
Autonomy is being used more widely in warfare, but a lot of what is described as autonomous still heavily relies on humans.Ukrinform/NurPhoto via Getty Images
